name: Lotophagism
desc: When ally targets use their Ultimate, for each 50 Energy consumed, increases ATK by 5% and increases the DMG multiplier of "Aftertaste" dealt by 2% of the original multiplier. This effect can stack up to 20 times, lasting for 3 turn(s). Each time an Ultimate is used, it will be considered as having consumed at least 80 Energy.
